channel.title: [TUT][PI] Player Shadows
channel.description:
hello guys today i am going to show you how to add player shadows this has original made by dutchboy but i modified to recent clients i did this on Lost Legacy client difficulty : 1/10 knowledge : copy and past , your brain and eyes first of open [b]player.java[/b] search for:
int j2 = 0;
you will something like this
Model aclass30_sub2_sub4_sub6s[] = new Model[12];
change the 12 to 13 now you will have this
Model aclass30_sub2_sub4_sub6s[] = new Model[13];
under the code
int j2 = 0;
add
aclass30_sub2_sub4_sub6s[j2++] = Model.method462(16314); model_1 = new Model(j2, aclass30_sub2_sub4_sub6s);
Compile and run the Client now it should look like this [img]http://i42.tinypic.com/30scca1.png[/img] Credits Dutchboy 70% for writting this me 30% renaming some stuff and making tut

item.title: [TUT][PI] Player Shadows
item.dc:creator: @Bullos Bullos
item.description:
@Bullos wrote:

hello guys today i am going to show you how to add player shadows
this has original made by dutchboy
but i modified to recent clients
i did this on Lost Legacy client

difficulty : 1/10

knowledge : copy and past , your brain and eyes

first of open player.java

search for:

int j2 = 0;

you will something like this

Model aclass30_sub2_sub4_sub6s[] = new Model[12];
change the 12 to 13

now you will have this

Model aclass30_sub2_sub4_sub6s[] = new Model[13];

under the code

int j2 = 0;

add

aclass30_sub2_sub4_sub6s[j2++] = Model.method462(16314); model_1 = new Model(j2, aclass30_sub2_sub4_sub6s);

Compile and run the Client

now it should look like this

30scca1.png781Ã—563

Credits
Dutchboy 70% for writting this
me 30% renaming some stuff and making tut
